itunes:title: 03 The Spartan Woman, Part 2
title: 03 The Spartan Woman, Part 2
description: Steven Pressfield continues discussion of the women of Sparta. To read a great story of Spartan culture, check out the best seller GATES OF FIRE by Steven Pressfield.
